NAME: Oliver Klemenz
HOME_SUB_TITLE1: Here you find information about me.
HOME_SUB_TITLE2: Scroll down and get to know me.
IOS_PROJECTS_DESCR: Applications and modules developed the last years
CDS_WS_DESCR: @cap-js-community/websocket is a plugin for SAP Cloud Application Programming Model for Node.js. It exposes a WebSocket protocol via WebSocket standard or Socket.IO for CDS services.
ROBOT_DESCR:
Robot is a remote control for Lego Boost. Check sensor values, manually control robot or start auto-pilot.
Play Online
MATCH_QUBE_DESCR:
Match Qube is a minimalistic 3D-based browser game. Place three spheres of the same color on top of each other for a match. Play against time before the qube is filled and game is over.
Play online
PRINCE_JS_DESCR:
PrinceJS is a port of the famous game classic Prince Of Persia (1989 / MS-DOS) for HTML5/JS based on the Phaser 2 game framework. Venture through dungeons to defeat Grand Vizier Jaffar.
Play at princejs.com
TV_TANK_TOUCH_DESCR: TV Tank Touch is a mind-boggling strategy and skills game that lets you control a cartoon tank on your iOS device through a desert scenery. Reach all pulsating spots and shoot boxes located on your way. Spots and boxes disappear after certain times.
OKIT_DESCR: Easy to use application framework for Swift, to create apps based on models and storyboards with (almost) no code.
FUN_DESCR:
Aim and shoot... match colors... have fun!

A minimalistic puzzle with one-touch gameplay. Easy to learn hard to master...
f.u.n.
ARC_DESCR: AR-RC-Car (ARC) is a simulation of a Remote-Controlled Car, driving in your real environment via Augmented Reality (AR) technology. Get the app, design your track and race through your living room or garden.
SAY_HI_DESCR: You want to get to know new people, or you want to make new friends? You want to get into conversation with somebody, but you donâ€™t know how to begin? SAY Hi! gets you started, allowing to match your profiles. Android app available as well. SAY Hi!
TV_TANK_DESCR: TV Tank is a mind-boggling strategy and skills game that lets you control a cartoon tank on your Apple TV through a desert scenery. Reach all pulsating spots and shoot boxes located on your way. But watch out, spots and boxes disappear after certain times.
PUZZLE_15_DESCR: Puzzle of 15 is the famous sliding puzzle playable on the Apple Watch. The game consists of 15 numbered square tiles in random order with one empty tile space. The goal is to arrange all tiles in ascending numerical order.
RUBIKS_FIFTEEN_DESCR: Magic Fifteen is a two-sided sliding piece puzzle, consisting of 17 tiles in a 5x5 square. The middle three columns have vertical sliders moving 4 tiles up and down.
RUBIKS_CLOCK_DESCR: Puzzle Clock is a two-sided puzzle, each side presenting nine clocks. The aim of the puzzle is to set all nine clocks to 12 o'clock on both sides of the puzzle simultaneously.
CUP_CONFUSION_DESCR: Test your skills on this world famous game, trying to follow a ball under one of three cups. The cups are shuffled in increasing speed and duration and you must try to reveal the correct cup containing the ball.
HOT_WIRE_DESCR: Hot Wire is a fascinating simulation of a game of skill challenging you in controlling a metal ring through various types of metal wires without contacting them.
IFROGGI_DESCR: Control the cute frog iFroggi across the lake jumping from water lily pad to water lily pad by simply swiping on the iPhone multi-touch display.
